dt: {bc}to engage in harmless fun or mischief

shortdef: to engage in harmless fun or mischief —often used with about

dt: {bc}any of a family (Alaudidae) of chiefly Old World ground-dwelling songbirds that are usually brownish in color

et: Middle English {it}laveroc, laverke{/it}, from Old English {it}lāwerce{/it}; akin to Old High German {it}lērihha{/it} lark
shortdef: any of a family (Alaudidae) of chiefly Old World ground-dwelling songbirds that are usually brownish in color; especially : skylark

dt: {bc}a source of or quest for amusement or adventure

shortdef: a source of or quest for amusement or adventure

dt: {bc}a brownish chiefly Holarctic lark ({it}Eremophila alpestris{/it} of the family Alaudidae) that has small tufts of black feathers on top of the head

shortdef: a brownish chiefly Holarctic lark (Eremophila alpestris of the family Alaudidae) that has small tufts of black feathers on top of the head
